verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nyaayapeetahmu nee mundu unnadi dyaaninchi choodu kurchunnadevaro{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neevu nashinchuta koradu prabhu opikato ayane vechi yunnaau pashchaathaapa padumippudaina Nishchaya merugu narakamu tappadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parikshinchukonumu nee maranameppudo Raktamu dwara mukthi ponditiva Katihnathwamutho thrunikarinchina Nyaaya thraasu unnadi raaraaju chethilo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daagi unna paapamu prabhuyesu chuchenu Andha kaara paapamu thana kantapadenu Thana drustinundi tappinchukonduvaa Theerpu kodavali thana chentanundaga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andarikorakai grandhamul theruvaga Vaari vishayamai vraasina reetin Deva gorrepilla nyayamu tirchunu Tana chetanunnadi tirpukai cheta{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu Yesunandu siksha vidhiledu Deevenala nonduchu ghanatha nondedaru Yellapudayanathone yundedaru Prabhuve nichunu jeeva kireetamu{/lang-eng}
